definition: to open/to start/to turn on/to boil/to write out (a prescription, check, invoice etc)/to operate (a vehicle)/carat (gold)/abbr. for Kelvin, 開爾文|开尔文[Kai1 er3 wen2]/abbr. for 開本|开本[kai1 ben3], book format

sentences.english: There is no doubt that travelling broadens one’s mind and enlarge/improve/increase one’s knowledge.
sentences.chinese: 毫无疑问，旅行使人开阔眼界，增长知识。

sentences.english: Smoke grenades are used for concealment while moving over open areas such as streets.
sentences.chinese: 烟幕弹用于开阔地或者街巷的隐蔽。

sentences.english: But both are lit from above by generous skylights.
sentences.chinese: 但是都被最上方开阔的天窗照亮了。

sentences.english: Many regions of the country are relatively flat, but underground cisterns exist.
sentences.chinese: 该国家的很多地区相对开阔，但地下蓄水池仍存在。

sentences.english: Increased the angle you can turn the cockpit camera in the rear hemisphere.
sentences.chinese: 增加了坐舱视野在后半球的开阔角度。

sentences.english: Fourth, I will pay a visit to some tourist attractions to widen my horizon.
sentences.chinese: 最后，我还要参观一些游览胜地，开阔眼界。

sentences.english: It is the one day in the year when most of us grow big of heart and broad of mind.
sentences.chinese: 圣诞节是一年中大多数人心胸开阔，气度非凡的一天。

sentences.english: A tolerant person usually has breadth of mind.
sentences.chinese: 有宽容精神的人通常胸襟开阔。

sentences.english: Like I said, he's really big at heart.
sentences.chinese: 正像我说的，他确实心胸开阔。

sentences.english: The bleached wood flooring and neutral colors contribute to the feeling of spaciousness.
sentences.chinese: 退了色的木地板以及中性色调让空间显得更为开阔。
阅读能开阔我们的视野。

sentences.english: The ocean will make your open-minded, the Lao mountain then lets you realize pure falsely with secluded .
sentences.chinese: 大海会使你的心胸开阔，崂山则让你体会清虚与幽静。

sentences.english: Fourth, Gray wolf have big-hearted sunshine psychology.
sentences.chinese: 第四，灰太狼有心胸开阔的阳光心态。

sentences.english: With self-confidence, open mind, positive and creativity.
sentences.chinese: 自信，思维开阔，积极进取并勇于创新。

sentences.english: An enterpriser should have the wide vision.
sentences.chinese: 一个企业家应具有开阔的视野。

definition: suddenly opens up to a wide panorama (idiom); to come to a wide clearing/fig. everything becomes clear at once/to achieve speedy enlightenment
